name.ch: 跨領域神經科學講座(二)

department.en: International Ph.D. Program in Interdisciplinary Neuroscience
department.ch: 跨領域神經科學國際研究生博士學位學程

goal.en: “The interdisciplinary neuroscience lecture course is designed to provide graduate students with an opportunity to broaden their visions by learning the lectures from the World’s top scholars whose works contribute to the emerging field from the life sciences, physical sciences, and applied sciences and to promote their knowledge in multidisciplinary science fields.“
goal.ch: 培養學生有專精的神經科學知識，並能從較寬廣的角度學習與瞭解神經科學領域。 學程涵蓋不同領域的老師，本課程將介紹從基礎到臨床應用之認知神經科學，並拓展至資訊與工程。

content.ch: 設置跨領域神經科學講座課程

textbook.en: Selected papers from peer-reviewed journal articles

grading.en: Class participation Experiment preparation and execution Final term paper
grading.ch: 課程參與度 資料收集與分析 期末報告
